def largest_sum(s):
    return max(sum(map(int,x)) for x in s.split('0'))

def largest_sum(s):
    return max(sum(map(int, e)) for e in s.split('0'))

def largest_sum(s):
    return max(sum(int(i) for i in j) for j in s.split('0'))

def largest_sum(s):
    return max(sum(int(x) for x in n) for n in s.split('0'))

def largest_sum(s):
    return max(sum(map(int, list(n))) for n in s.split('0'))

def largest_sum(s):
    return max(sum(map(int,i)) for i in s.split("0"))

def largest_sum(s):
    return max(sum(map(int, c)) for c in s.split('0'))
